quote: To regret one’s own experiences is to arrest one’s own development. To deny one’s own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one’s own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.
quote_letters: TO REGRET ONES OWN EXPERIENCES IS TO ARREST ONES OWN DEVELOPMENT TO DENY ONES OWN EXPERIENCES IS TO PUT A LIE INTO THE LIPS OF ONES OWN LIFE IT IS NO LESS THAN A DENIAL OF THE SOUL
